forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Winds increasing late. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the evening, with showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
